short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Manage DeFi and see all tokens across all EVM chains

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This week's updates:
• Use Euro Monerium bank transfers after identity verification, even before activating your card
• Card import with guide should make getting started with Gnosis Pay easy
• Local Currency Display: Change the display currency and view your portfolio in your local currency for a more personalized experience.
• Real-Time Yield Accrual: Watch your Earn account yields accrue in real time, giving you up-to-the-second updates on your earnings.
• Bug Fixes: Various fixes to ensure a smoother and more reliable app experience.

Gnosis Pay Card
• Spend your crypto in real-life with an onchain Visa card
• Manage the card from your wallet and see card details on the go

Multinetwork Portfolio 📊 
• Check your net worth overall or by network.
• Track DeFi positions on web3 apps you've invested in.
• Switch between multiple wallets seamlessly.

Zeal Smart Wallet
Create a wallet with the touch of your finger, top it up for free and get started within minutes.
• Built with Gnosis Safe. Industry-leading contracts that secure >$100bn 🔐
• Pay network fees in many tokens
• Secure your wallet with biometrics and Passkeys
• Recover your wallet using Google or Apple cloud
• Use the same address on 10 EVM-networks
• Works everywhere MetaMask works

Transfer between your bank and Zeal for free, in minutes 💸
• EUR 🇪🇺  and GBP 🇬🇧
• USDC/USDT on Optimism/Arbitrum/Polygon/Base

Security and Scam Protection 🔒
• Safety Checks: Prevent scams and costly mistakes before signing transactions.
• Transaction Preview: See in simple language exactly what you'll sign.
• Hardware Wallet: Transact securely with your Ledger or Trezor hardware wallet.

Swap & Bridge without extra fees 🔥
• Swap: Get the best rates in the market without no extra fees.
• Bridge: Move tokens between networks using the fastest and cheapest routes.
• Token and NFT Sending: Send tokens and NFTs effortlessly to other wallets.

Robust Security & Privacy
• Full self-custody: Your keys are encrypted and stay on your device.
• Integrated VPN prevents blockchain nodes from tracking your personal data.
• Seamless Ledger and Trezor integration.
